"Word Lens finds words and translates them
"no network needed!
"Tap here to change or buy languages"

"Word Lens works best on big, well-lit signs and menus.
Not so well on books or stylized text."

"signs and menus.

"As a demo, the free edition reverses any words found.
Additional language packs are available via in-app purchase."

"Sorry, this device is not capable of running Word Lens. We have tried to restrict purchases to compatible devices only, but we missed yours!
Please contact "help@questvisual.com for a refund. Please include your Google Wallet order number so we can issue a refund, and your Android device model so we can prevent this in the future.

"Please include your Google Wallet order number if you are requesting a refund.
Unsupported device encountered running Word Lens."
"Glad you like Word Lens! Please help us out by rating us on Google Play! ★★★★★"
Thank you for your feedback! Please include your e-mail address.
Unable to send feedback. Please check your data connection and try again.
Text too small. Please zoom in or move closer.

"Word Lens translates written words from one language to another. Point your camera at the words to translate. Touch the bar at the top of the screen to choose a language pair or demo mode.
Tilt your device so the words that you are reading are aligned the same as the top bar. Screen rotation can be locked/unlocked by pressing the button in the lower left.
Stop and start the video with the pause/play button at the bottom. In the paused mode, you can touch on a word to see the translation list. The translation list will show you similar-looking words along with alternate definitions in case there was an error reading or translating the word. Adjust the word spelling if it helps. You can also see the translation list by clicking the book icon in the main camera screen on the bottom right. While paused, hold down the eye icon in the bottom left of the main screen to temporarily hide the translation overlay, revealing the plain camera view.
Use the zoom and flash light buttons (if they are available on your device) to improve your translation quality. The zoom helps for reading small words up close when the camera has difficulty focusing. In low light conditions, use the flash light button to turn on and off the light."
Purchase Word Lens from Google Play
Touch and hold icon to hide translation
This app cannot connect to Google Play. Your version of Google Play may be out of date or missing. You can continue to use this app but you will not be able to purchase additional languages.
The in-app billing service is not available on your device. You can continue to use this app but you will not be able to purchase additional languages.
Billing service unavailable. Please check your data connection and try again.
Our apologies! Word Lens has an internal error that prevents purchasing languages. Please contact help@questvisual.com with this error.

"May Word Lens use the network to report errors and anonymous usage statistics?
This will help us fix errors and improve our product. Thank you!"
Welcome!" Does your camera video appear rotated or upside down?"
Use the buttons to rotate the video until it is upright.
